title: GIVE ME GOLD REWARDS
body: I AM YET TO RECEIVE ANYTHING FOR REACHING GOLD, I HAVE WAITED PATIENTLY UNTIL NOW AND NOW I'M ANNOYED, RIOT YOU SAID I WOULD RECEIVE IT LATEST BY 29TH OF NOVEMBER, IT IS THE 30TH, YOU CAN CHECK MY ACCOUNT FOR RANK, JUST GIVE ME MY REWARDS THAT I WORKED FOR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
